thread.title: Barclays CEO fined $1.5 mln for trying to unmask whistleblower

title: Barclays CEO fined $1.5 mln for trying to unmask whistleblower
text:
Barclays CEO fined $1.5 mln for trying to unmask whistleblower 9:05pm IST - 01:05
British regulators and Barclays have fined the bank's Chief Executive Jes Staley a combined 1.1 million pounds ($1.5 million) after he tried to identify a whistleblower who sent letters criticising an employee of the bank. David Pollard reports.
British regulators and Barclays have fined the bank's Chief Executive Jes Staley a combined 1.1 million pounds ($1.5 million) after he tried to identify a whistleblower who sent letters criticising an employee of the bank. David Pollard reports. //reut.rs/2G7vpcT
